idea:
iEdge7 was founded with a vision of simplifying and unifying all needs of an Indian international student providing end to end services with the objective of creating a “Simplified Campus Life”.

The entire journey of the student consists of preparation for the admission, choosing the correct course and university, admission and VISA processing, travel to new university, settling down with mobile connectivity + books + bank account + health insurance, money transfer for fees and expenses, parcel services for Indian food etc , finding intern projects, change of course or university (if required) and finally exploring for jobs at the end of the course.

At the moment, there are few unorganized solutions like admission counselling but there is no single window comprehensive service addressing the need of the student. We are building a two-sided network of International Colleges and Schools (through Counselors and Direct) to facilitate transparent direct admission and total end to end services, for prospective students.
name: Iedge7 Technology Private Limited

idea:
MentorSavvy Education Pvt Ltd plans to become the one-stop learning hub for all kinds of educational needs. We use modern technology and cloud solutions to enable online & classroom based educational programs, personal tutoring along with testing and assessment solutions. We cater to all learning stages in life - right from K-12 schooling and entrance exam preparations to vocational and professional skill-development courses.

In our rapidly modernizing world, the need for skilled labour is increasing quickly. People need to be trained in emerging technologies to gain the versatile skill-set required by new businesses. MentorSavvy Education aims to enable this using the internet by bringing the teaching and learning community closer together. We will provide millions of students with one-click access to expert teachers within the community.

By bringing all forms of out-of-school learning under one portal, we wish to change education from being a phase of life to becoming a lifelong activity.
name: MentorSavvy Education Pvt Ltd

idea: Our organization is established at SINE IIT-Bombay and working on Assestive technologies for Divyangjan. Our present device is MASC-KAFO (Mechanically actuated knee ankle foot orthosis) an Device used for correcting the gait of the patients suffering from locomotor disability.
name: AUMEESH TECH PRIVATE LIMITED
